short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quotes on every new tab you open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quotable presents novel and inspiring quotes on each new tab, elegantly presented against captivating backgrounds. Enhance your browsing experience with its intuitive and refined interface, providing daily doses of motivation. You may select from a carefully curated selection of categories to determine the quotes displayed.
